publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2309# Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh: International Rescue Corpsâ€”That the Parliament recognises the work of the International Rescue Corps based in Grangemouth and applauds its ability and willingness to assist in rescue efforts following the recent terrorist atrocities in the United States of America.
